document.heading: Confidentiality and Disclosure of Records on Abused and Neglected Children Act of 1979

history.narrative: Law 3-29, the “Confidentiality and Disclosure of Records on Abused and Neglected Children Act of 1979,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-159, which was referred to the Committee on Human Resources. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 17, 1979 and July 31, 1979, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 1, 1979, it was assigned Act No. 3-78 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
